title: Happy Little Demon
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Hey, what do you think about this costume?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Hold on. Being a little demon isn’t just simple cosplay. You should wear something more noble and majestic. Otherwise, I’m not inviting you into my live streams anymore!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Aww, I thought it would look cute.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Well... It does suit you. I guess I have no choice. Here, you can borrow some of Yohane’s items. This hat, the cape, and these lace gloves will make you look even better. Okay..... There. Much better.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Wow! This is awesome!! I look even cooler now!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>You mean nobler!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Hehehe. Being a little demon is fun!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Hmm... Oh, right. Want some snacks before the stream starts? I had a lot of free time yesterday, so I made cookies.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Wow, really!? Yay~! I love cookies! Yoshi— ...I mean, Yohane is so kind to her little demons~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>I’m not trying to be kind! Remember that little demons are supposed to serve Yohane!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
